question: "The intake valve is open and exhaust valve is closed. The air is drawn into cylinder while the piston is moving downward" defines;
On most diesel engines, the governor controls the speed by:
options: 1) Controlling the amount of fuel injected into the cylinders
2) Varying the speed of the turbocharger
4) Changing the timing of the fuel injection camshaft
5) Changing the timing of the exhaust valves

question: In two stroke engines, if the engine has exhaust valve(s), it is a .................... scavenged engine.
.................... is the control of temperature and humidity in a space together with the circulation, filtering and refreshing of the air.
An overspeeding diesel engine could best be stopped by:
options: 1) Disconnecting the battery cables from the starting motor
3) Draining the hydraulic fluid from the governor sump
4) Blocking the flow of cooling air to the radiator
5) Blocking the air intake and securing the fuel supply
correctAnswer: 5) Blocking the air intake and securing the fuel supply

question: The sequence of events in a cycle within 4 stroke diesel engine is:1- The piston is forced down at BDC (Bottom Dead Center) exhaust valve opens2- The piston is at the top of its stroke, TDC (Top Dead Center), inlet valve opens, fresh air is drawn3- Pressure is high in the gases4- Fuel is injected as the piston reaches TDC, to start the combustion5- Inlet valve opens, fresh air drawn as the piston moves down6- At the bottom of the stroke BDC inlet valve closes and the air in cylinder is compressed as the piston rises
Any electric motor can be constructed to be .................... prof.
The cylinder cover is tightened against liner with studs. What word can be used instead of the underlined word?
While making your rounds, you notice the main lube oil temperature is higher than normal. To remedy this situation, you should:
options: 1) Speed up the main lube oil pump
2) Open the lube oil cooler seawater inlet valve wider
3) Throttle in on the lube oil cooler seawater discharge valve
4) Close the lube oil cooler seawater discharge valve wider
5) Open the lube oil cooler seawater discharge valve wider
correctAnswer: 5) Open the lube oil cooler seawater discharge valve wider
